response.overview: Three couples-Shawn and Chelsea, Mack and Ciara, and Jen and Mike-go on a weekend getaway to Joshua Tree. The trip takes a dark turn when Mack goes missing after the first day. As tensions rise and secrets come to light, the friends must confront their deepest fears and suspicions, unraveling a mystery that threatens to change their lives forever.
response.title: Caught Slippin
